mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM fc_loan_accepted_order where
(location_ = #{location_} AND #{next_interact_time_} >= next_interact_time_) or (location_ = #{location_} AND next_interact_time_ is null)

SELECT
FROM fc_loan_order_send WHERE loan_accepted_order_id_ = #{loan_accepted_order_id_} ORDER BY sent_time_ DESC LIMIT 1
